titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation, anent the late horrid attempt made upon the High-street of Edinburgh. Edinburgh, the fourteenth day of July, one thousand six hundred and sixty eight.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

notesStmt.note: Signed: Al. Gibson, Cl. Sti Concilii.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
